div.head: 大便難澀
div.div: major relief with difficulty and roughness; difficult and rough defecation

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major relief with difficulty and roughness; difficult and rough defecation

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with bian nan 便難 , difficult defecation. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ku gua 甜瓜 quoting Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 : 大便有膿 , “The stool carries pus”, writes: 大便難澀下膿 , “ defecation is difficult and rough , with a discharge of pus”.
